quality_assessment: Page does not exist. Should be created as a comprehensive troubleshooting reference that consolidates common issues from features inventory and existing FAQ.

issues.description: Reference troubleshooting page does not exist
issues.fix_suggestion: Create docs/reference/troubleshooting.md with comprehensive troubleshooting guide covering common issues from features inventory

issues.description: Need consolidated list of common user issues across all features
issues.fix_suggestion: Add sections for: MapReduce failures, session/resume issues, variable interpolation, worktree cleanup, merge conflicts, high failure rates

issues.description: Need section on debugging techniques and tools
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section covering: verbosity flags, event logs, Claude JSON logs, checkpoint inspection, DLQ analysis

issues.description: Need guide to interpreting common error messages
issues.fix_suggestion: Add section explaining common error messages: 'session not found', 'command not found: claude', 'no items to process', 'cleanup failed', 'resume already in progress'
Add section covering: slow MapReduce execution, high resource usage, timeout errors, parallelism tuning

issues.description: Should link to specialized troubleshooting pages in other sections
issues.fix_suggestion: Add cross-references to: troubleshooting/faq.md, troubleshooting/best-practices-for-debugging.md, and section-specific troubleshooting pages

positive_aspects: Existing FAQ page covers many common questions well
Good cross-references to detailed specs in CLAUDE.md
improvement_suggestions: Create reference troubleshooting page as central hub for all troubleshooting resources
Organize by symptom/error type rather than feature area for easier navigation
Include quick diagnostic flowcharts or decision trees
Add 'Quick Fixes' section for most common issues
Link to existing FAQ and specialized troubleshooting pages
Include section on when to check logs vs DLQ vs events
Add troubleshooting for concurrent resume protection (Spec 140)
Cover JSON log location tracking (Spec 121) for MapReduce debugging
Document cleanup failure handling (Spec 136) troubleshooting steps

metadata.validation_focus: Check troubleshooting covers common user issues
